name: Monica Brockmeyer
content: Monica Brockmeyer - James and Patricia Anderson College of Engineering - Wayne State University Monica Brockmeyer Associate Professor, Computer Science Contact (313) 577-9001 mab@cs.wayne.edu Monica Brockmeyer Associate Professor, Computer Science Education Ph.D 1999, University of Michigan Research interests High Assurance Systems, Distributed Systems, Real-Time Systems, Safety-Critical Systems, Formal Methods and Verification, Testing Courses taught by Monica Brockmeyer Fall Term 2025 (current) CSC3400 - Human-Computer Interaction Fall Term 2024 CSC3400 - Human-Computer Interaction ← Return to listing ↑
